channel.title: Baby Meadow on
channel.description: Recent content in Baby Meadow on

item.title: Alucinara Energy
item.description: Overview Alucinara, also known as magic, is a form of energy that alters the ways in which the natural world can operate.

item.title: Aurűk Religion
item.description: Deities The Aurűk’s primary deity was the Petrified Child; a figure they termed Stéyą. They venerated many other minor deities, all who represented the elements of the world that could be influenced by symbols.

item.title: bean
item.description: %% What are the significant features which make this relevant to the plot? What patterns are there when it comes to description and properties?

item.title: Bushdeer
item.description: Overview Bushdeer (Type Species spp. Floricervus Floricervus), native to the steppes of the 2nd and -1st realms, are a type of deer related to the Sika deer of Earth.

item.title: Cloud Gnats
item.description: Overview Cloud Gnats are animal-like apparitions made of alucinariferous dust. They commonly appear as small animals, standing upright with their abdomen tapering off into a wispy tail.

item.title: Darkness
item.description: Overview Darkness, similar to Alucinara, is a form of energy that forms the foundation of the Soul. It does this by enforcing the second laws of nature, which defined the methods by which spirits could operate.

item.title: Early History of the Minikin
item.description: Timeline 5 MYA Minikin begin to diverge from the lineage that would become red squirrels Minikin ancestors are shifted from the 0th realm to the 2nd due to supernova 3 MYA The genus Anthrosciurus diverges from Sciurus Anthrosciurids begin to use tools 1 MYA Anthrosciurids begin to use fire and magic Language is developed in Anthrosciurids 300,000 YA Early Minikin evolve into Modern Minikin (Anthrosciurus arborensis) in northern Tséireph 200,00 YA First wave of minikin migration takes place Ancestors of Eastern Minikin (subspecies Anthrosciurus arborensis occidentalis) migrate to the eastern continent and eastern islands Modern Minikin spread across whole of Tséireph 175,000 YA Second wave of minikin migration takes place Ancestors of Southern Minikin (subspecies Anthrosciurus arborensis australis) migrate to southwestern continent 50,000 YA Third and final wave of minikin migration takes place Ancestors of Insular Minikin (subspecies Anthrosciurus arborensis insulensis) diverge from Southern Minikin and continue to migrate south to the southwestern archipelago The various Minikin subspecies begin to spread and cohabitate with other races 10,000 YA Agriculture begins to be practised by Minikin, originating in fluvial areas with seasonal floods in Mediterranean climates.

item.title: Enchantment
item.description: Overview Enchantment is the term given to the presence of the First Laws in a being or item’s behaviour. This means that if a being or object is enchanted, it will act strangely, in predictable or unpredictable ways depending on the specific enchantment.

item.title: Fauna of the Second Realm
item.description: Minikin Minikin are a sapient rodent species native to the 2nd realm. They are descended from the European Red Squirrel, with a lifespan of 12-18 years, reaching maturity around 8 years of age.

item.title: Flora of the Second Realm
item.description: Nyuta Bushes Nyuta bushes are a type of bush native to the 2nd and 1st realms. They have red leaves and purple berries.

item.title: Fortuitary Gland
item.description: Overview Fortuitary glands are glands dedicated to the secretion of Alucinarium, and are integral to the use of Alucinara in biological processes or tools.

item.title: History of the Morellic Minikin
item.description: Overview The Morellic race is a race of minikin descending from the Sarvaran, Aqhoran, and Corothic cultures. These cultures were forager nomads from the west, north, and east, who settled in the Sarvaran river basin due to it’s highly fertile soil and the Mora river’s seasonal flooding.

item.title: Ikplik
item.description: Overview The Ikplik is a mundozoan animal native to the 2nd Realm. Descended from meerkats, they retain their size, pack structure, and appearance despite their shift into the niche of herbivores native to grassland habitats.

item.title: Minikin
item.description: Overview Minikin (spp. Anthrosciurus sapiens) are a small rodent species native to the 2nd Realm. They are arboreal omnivores which tend toward eating nuts and other plants, and descended from red squirrels from the 0th realm.

item.title: Morellic Clothing
item.description: Overview Morellic clothing is characterised by three things: Shape, Colour, and Material. These three elements come together to create a morellic garment.

item.title: Mundozoa
item.description: %% What are the significant features which make this relevant to the plot? What patterns are there when it comes to description and properties?

item.title: Pebble Spires
item.description: Overview Pebble Spires are a phenomenon caused when rocks interact with Alucinara. They are largely benign, but can pose danger when toppled.

item.title: Sky Islands
item.description: Overview Generally, sky islands are large animal-shaped islands which float above the surface of the ground. They often feature self-sustaining ecosystems atop them, with a forest or grassland on the topside, and a rocky underside which changes shape due to Alucinara influence.

item.title: Soulstones
item.description: Overview Soulstones are deposits of bitumen or asphalt where, in the presence of alucinara energy, the soul of a deceased organism may be stored after death.

item.title: Symbols
item.description: Overview Symbols are shapes or images through which alucinara energy can be channeled for a specific effect. This is achieved as symbols emulate the beauty of the world pre-shattering.

item.title: The Chronicle of the Founding of Sarvara
item.description: SCRIPTURA EX MUNDO PRAE ET POST FRACTO Chapter 1 1 Before Lunuth had first sprouted, before it had been ground into flour or baked into bread, the first Judge and the second Judge ruled the cosmos.

item.title: The Petrified Child
item.description: Overview The Petrified Child is an entity with the purpose of governing evil, a task given by the second Judge. It accomplishes this through the use of watchstones and the turning of evildoers into baby meadows.

item.title: The Sarvaran River Basin
item.description: Overview The Sarvaran river basin is a river basin on the southern coast of Tséireph. It’s main river is the river Sarvara, which flows from Lake Jerrun in the Sarvaran highlands.

item.title: The Spirits of Darkness
item.description: Overview

item.title: The Story of Creation
item.description: Overview The creation story of the universe is characterised by one main event - the shattering of the realms. The universe was created by the two Judges, and shattered by the spirits of darkness.

item.title: Tseiréph
item.description: Overview Tseiréph is the central continent of the 2nd Realm.

item.title: Watchstones
item.description: Overview Watchstones are artificial patrols invented by the Sarvaran minikin for the purpose of giving The Petrified Child a greater visual range.
